page.title: 04Onecote Sunday School/Chapel
page.content:
There is a Sunday School held in the old school buildings in Onecote. About 16 children attend on the three Sundays it is held each month. During the last 20 minutes the children join their parents in the church service and are blessed before singing the final hymn.
{Onecote Chapel} The Methodist chapel in Onecote was built in 1822. It is built of gritstone and has stained glass windows throughout. There are two wardens who help the preacher. The services are held every Sunday at 11 o'clock. The chapel will seat 90 people but only about 15 people regularly attend the services. There is not a choir. Last year there was one marriage, one funeral and no baptisms.
